thread.title: Manchester United transfer rumours: Eric Bailly 'recommends' Franck Kessie to Jose Mourinho
thread.title_full: Manchester United transfer rumours: Eric Bailly 'recommends' Franck Kessie to Jose Mourinho

author: Ciaran Kelly
title: Manchester United transfer rumours: Eric Bailly 'recommends' Franck Kessie to Jose Mourinho
text:
Get Manchester United FC   Thank you for subscribing!   
Manchester United defender Eric Bailly has recommended compatriot Franck Kessie to boss Jose Mourinho , according to reports. 
The 20-year-old has been heavily linked with a £25m move to the Premier League after a series of dominant displays for Atalanta in Serie A. 
After helping fire La Dea to fifth place in Serie A, the midfielder has become a regular starter for the Ivory Coast alongside Bailly. 
Kessie previously said he was 'flattered' by links to Europe's elite clubs and it seems Bailly has put in a word at Old Trafford . 
A United source reportedly told the Sun : “Bailly has flagged his international pal Kessie to the club. He thinks he could be the new Yaya. 
“He was watched during the AFCON and they like what they see. There is other clubs looking at him as well.”
